values: Getting at the Heart of God-Focused Ministry, Session 5 (Q & A)Getting at the Heart of God-Focused Ministry, Session 5 (Q & A)

Under God’s blessing, preaching God-Centered truth has a way of bringing all other aspects of healthy church life and Christian duty into their proper place and proportion.
